admission.description: We are excited to guide you through the admission process and help you take the first step toward an innovative career in technology and creative industries.
admission.sub-description: ACT College welcomes applicants who are passionate about pursuing education in Computer Science, Engineering & Manufacturing, or Digital Art. We accept students who have completed their secondary education and are ready to embark on their vocational journey.
admission.scholarship-description: ACT College is committed to making education accessible. We offer scholarships to outstanding students based on academic merit and financial need.
admission.scholarship-sub-description: For more details on the application process and eligibility criteria, please contact our admissions emailing us at

mandatory-education.description: ACT College, mandatory education is a 3-year program available for students who have completed the 9th grade, providing a strong foundation in their chosen fields to prepare them for future academic or career success.

certification-courses.description: ACT College offers a range of after-class certification courses.These courses provide an excellent opportunity for individuals to gain specialized skills and knowledge in a flexible and efficient format.

summer-school.description: ACT College offers summer school program designed for youth. These program allows students to develop new skills, deepen their knowledge, and explore their interests in a focused environment during the summer months.

courses.description: ACT College offers a range of courses in software development, data science and other sectors of interest in technology. These courses provide hands-on, practical learning experiences designed to equip students with the skills needed for success in todayâ€™s tech-driven job market.

admission-member-0.description: Responsible for evaluating applications, conducting interviews, and making decisions on student admissions to ensure a diverse and qualified student body.

admission-member-1.name: Margarita Krtikashyan
admission-member-1.description: Responsible for handling calls, sending invitations, coordinating meetings, and guiding campus tours for prospective students.

admission-member-2.name: Levon Hayrapetyan
admission-member-2.description: Responsible for managing scholarship applications and ensuring that eligible students receive financial support as per ACT Scholarship Policy and procedures.
